author: cnbc.com
title: At Home Group Inc. to Announce First Quarter Fiscal 2019 Earnings Results on June 7, 2018
text:
PLANO, Texas, May 24, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- At Home Group Inc. (NYSE: HOME), the home décor superstore, today announced that its financial results for the first quarter of fiscal 2019 will be released after market close on Thursday, June 7, 2018. The company will host a conference call at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss the financial results.
Investors and analysts interested in participating in the call are invited to dial 877-407-0789 (international callers please dial 201-689-8562) approximately 10 minutes prior to the start of the call. A live audio webcast of the conference call, including related materials, will be available online at investor.athome.com .
A recorded replay of the conference call will be available within two hours of the conclusion of the call and can be accessed both online at investor.athome.com and by dialing 844-512-2921 (international callers please dial 412-317-6671). The pin number to access the telephone replay is 13680117. The replay will be available until June 14, 2018.
About At Home Group Inc.
At Home (NYSE: HOME), the home décor superstore, offers more than 50,000 on-trend home products to fit any budget or style, from furniture, mirrors, rugs, art and housewares to tabletop, patio and seasonal decor. At Home is headquartered in Plano, Texas, and currently operates 158 stores in 34 states. For more information, please visit us online at investor.athome.com .
